object.name: editMessageCaption
object.description: Use this method to edit captions of messages. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited Message is returned, otherwise True is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to edit captions of messages. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited Message is returned, otherwise True is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to edit captions of messages. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` is returned, otherwise :code:`True` is returned.

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.name: message_id

annotations.description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.html_description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.rst_description: Required if *chat_id* and *message_id* are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.name: inline_message_id

annotations.description: New caption of the message, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.html_description: New caption of the message, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.rst_description: New caption of the message, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.name: caption

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the message caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Mode for parsing entities in the message caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: Mode for parsing entities in the message caption. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: caption_entities

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for an `inline keyboard <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#inline-keyboards>`_.
annotations.name: reply_markup
